None.Name: Baneful Bolts
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, cannon blasts bolts that deal 208 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 312 in total. Affects air targets only.

None.Name: Tainted Magma
None.Description: Building is surrounded by a magmatic aura that deals 25 damage to all enemies within a 15m radius every 2 seconds.
